content: Dropping one star for two reasons: 1st, the game takes MINUTES to connect to the server after going afk: this is incredibly annoying. 2nd, too much luck involved to even bother to plan an efficient strategy. Pity because the game plays well and it's fun, but only for a few weeks. Buy if it goes on sale and if you like worker placement with "take that" mechanics, RNGods, leader's getaway and Viking theme (even if it's just graphical)

Excellent game which accurately reflects the board game. The interface is really easy to use, the graphics are superb and you can play against online players, against the AI, or both at the same time. Highly recommend.
Very good adaptation of the board game. Pass and play is good as well as the solo play. The only issue is touching and moving the pieces around the board. I do play on a Galaxy S8.
Fully agree on the lack of expansions
Incredible app for an incredible board game
Fantastic board game adaptation.
Awesome adaptation
Game is great but the lack of expansions after all this time doesn't bode well.
Truly stunning graphics and gameplay is awesome really love this game
Best boardgame experience But please consider bring 2 expansion to the game
replyContent: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to reach out! This has been passed along to the team. Have fun playing!

content: Very nice game and very well digital adaptation. I just couldn't find a way to play with 1 friend and an AI with pass and play. Also should we expect to see an expansion?
Great app! Easy to use, very similar to boardgame, good animations
Need expansion
replyContent: Hi Jason! Thanks for taking the time to share such a positive review! We have passed the feedback on to the team!

content: Great port of a great game. Plays smoothly, has a great pass and play mode, and looks beautiful.
replyContent: Hi Michael! Thank you so much! We deeply appreciate the kind words!

content: Great visuals and a great alternative seeing as the actual board game is difficult to get
replyContent: Hi Keith! Thank you so much! We are thrilled to hear you are enjoying Raiders of the North Sea!

content: It's just like the board game, but better because you can play solo against the AI, and they even have a little tutorial and campaign that teaches you the necessary rules and strategies. Oh, and unlike other comments, I haven't experienced a single bug, crash, or slowness of any kind
replyContent: Hi Ian! Thank you so much for the kind words! We are absolutely thrilled to hear you have had such a good experience with Raiders of the North Sea!

content: This used to be a 5 star app, but since the recent update it takes forever to load, and when you finally get in, you watch the other players turns, then the loading screen comes on again, and you then need to watch the other players turns once more before being able to play yourself. This is happening to me and the others I am currently playing games with. If this is sorted, review will go back up to 5 stars!
5 stars now!
replyContent:
David, 
Thanks for taking the time to leave a review! You should be able to tap and hold on a card to view its full text. If you are encountering issues doing so, or have any other questions or feedback, let us know at support@direwolfdigital.com, or directly in-game under Settings > Feedback on the title screen.

content: Doesn't display properly on OnePlus 7T, tried with lower Hz setting for display, tried without notch active. Mailed support, no reply. That's kind of a shame for a game you pay this much for.
replyContent:
Pascal,
We have replied to your support email with some tips on how to resolve your issue, and follow-up questions to help us look into it.

content: An faithful, stylish and stellar rendition of the real life board game. The most free flowing worker placement game I've ever played. And I don't even like worker placement.
Great worker placement game with beautiful art

*low stars* love this game (digital and physical versions) but unfortunately have yet to finish a match. first issue is consistent freezing of game when placing a worker. second issue is connectivity error despite being connected to internet and on mobile data. Third issue is inability to report issues via in game feedback tab due to connectivity issue. Edit *more stars* devs reached out
replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. Please reach out to support@direwolfdigital.com with some details about your device and username, and we will take a look!

content: One of the best board game app conversions I've seen. Desperately needs the expansions!
Game is amazing. However online play keeps dropping players and replacing them with ai players.
Would love to see the Hall of Heroes expansion or even the Fields of Fame.

a favourite board game so enjoying it digitally while we can't meet. But in the board game the Valkyrie are mixed with the gold and plunder and randomly placed with leftovers set aside, so the number of Valkyrie varies from game to game. Why are there always all 18 in the digital version?
Great version of an excellent boardgame
Only played once so far, seems decent. Graphics and game play is good. When would they make the expansions available? That's what I would love to see!
Each game is way too long
Any chance on the expansions being rolled out to the app? Already own the physical copies and would love to have them on the go.
Fun and seems to work well so far...
Awesome little worker placement game! I wanted to try it out before buying the actual board game to see if I'd like it and I really do.
Excellent game

A well-done board game. App has problems which causes it to freeze or blank screen. The result is that I have lost some wins and challenges completed. FYI, another user said you can't see what's on each card in your hand by tapping. You can by holding the tap for a second.
Awsome game
Great reproduction of a great board game with lovely animations.

Perfect adaption of the board game. Fun visuals and the control work very well. AI is decent with levels of difficulty. I like the addition of Challenges. I have not tried the campaign yet but will give it a go. Would like to see the board game expansions become available.
This game plays amazing!

It's simply the worst experience I've ever had with a boardgame app. And it's a shame because the interface is beautiful and adaptation really good. But it's absolutely impossible to play one game online without loosing connection 10 times. They have zero excuses. Some problems could potentially be understood when the app was released but its been a year now and there is no improvement.
Great graphics. Wonderful rendition. I wish I could see the entire board at the same time. I also wish they would add expansion.
Great fun solo and works well multiplayer across different platforms.
Good implementation of a favourite boardgame except... Rescue quest is unbalanced.

So glad I found this game! Great adaptation of the boardgame. The visuals and animations are great. The tutorial steps you through it and from there it is easy to play and master. The game controls work well and it is easy to navigate the cards and board. The challenges/achievements are a nice touch to keep you playing for goals. I never played the physical board game and just watched how-to videos on youtube, but so glad I finally purchased the app! One of my fav boardgames now!
Great app for a great game. I can't wait for the explanations

Great implementation of an excellent worker placement board game. The tutorial and challenges provide a very easy to follow way to learn the intricacies of how the game works and also strategies on how to win. A fun app to play and a great way to learn the board game itself.
Very good game. It helped me learn the rules so I will be able to play the board game.

Wish I could change the screen orientation on my larger tablet. No need to scroll across the map. Also slow in transitions. I keep moving the map when I want to place my worker if it's not quite ready (even though it already said my turn)

Game is really well made...until it ends. Always, and I do mean ALWAYS, crashes at the end of EVERY GAME!! Just as points are being revealed everything goes dark. Not sure what the problem is but if sediment needs to be addressed. Have never players a game where it doesn't happen. Pity really...everything else about this app is stellar. However, if you can never see how points are allocated, what's the point!?!?
replyContent: Thanks for leaving a review, and apologies that you are encountering this issue! Please drop a line to support@direwolfdigital.com with some details about your device and we'll take a look!

content: I love the art work. The gameplay is great and very fun. It doesnt drop me when I play online. The tutorial is helpful but I feel like a rulebook wouldnt be ammis. The controls could use a bit more feedback. I sometimes wanted to take an action but it wouldnt work and I couldnt tell if it was me or the game.
Please add expansions :) i will rate it 5 stars then
True to ticket to ride.

I've never played the board game but now I might buy it. This is one of the best implementations of a board game I've see, especially for online multiplayer, which works very well. If you are playing real time it will show you what the others are doing as they do it. If you exit the game in between turns it will notify you when your turn comes up, and if you are playing multiple games at once it will offer to bring you to the next game when you are done with your turn in the current one.

Solo, it's great. Setting up a multiplayer game was a horrible experience. Even more horrible was trying out the live game. It's so finicky and every time I minimize the game, my connection drops. I don't have this issue with other games, and I have plenty of boardgame ports that are so much easier to use.

Great tutorial got me started quickly , and it's a wonderful game with a decently challenging AI. However... I dropped my rating from 5 stars to 3 once I started trying to play online. The online experience is excruciating, with repeated crashes and necessary force-quits. Sometimes it takes 4 or 5 attempts just to play my turn. The friend I play with has an iphone, and has had similar experiences. So: fantastic game for solo play. But VERY buggy and frustrating to try to play online.

Very well polished and well executed conversion of a great app. Had one little bug where i couldn't grab my worker, instead it dragged the screen, but quitting to menu and back fixed that. Otherwise, great fun!

I'm sure the theme is not everyone's cup of tea but the implementation is fantastic! The graphics and music are top notch. The tutorials are very helpful. The campaig is a lot of fun. I'm lovin' it! *edit* The campaign is actually pretty tough.

I liked learning the game, but there is something about the "Rescue" level that is super dreadful. 1) This game should be above the "reroll" mechanism; drawing extra attention to luck is stupid. 2) "Gain 2 attack during raids?" Why doesn't it just say "4" on the red tag? 3) The AI is set up to have the upper hand on you in such a large way you will lose every time. 4) In a game where it's just me, why should there ever be 3 AI? A game I spent way too much for shouldn't build such hate so fast.
An excellent adaption of an excellent boardgame
Overall great game. Wish there were options to include all the expansions

Incredible... simply incredible! If all digital board game adaptations were of this standard, I wouldnt think twice before buying them! Pros: 1. Comes with a campaign 2. Extremely clear and lively board/animations 3. Comes with achievements!

Great game, great design, great graphics... It's really cool. I have the board game but this is much more fun when I can see the animation. One tip/problem: I would like to sync my progress in campaing within all my devices. Currently I have the game on my phone and my home tablet, logged on both devices with my "account" but the progress within the campaign is not synced. Please add. Thx and one of the best board game transformation into mobile game.
Really enjoy the game. Just dont like the disconnects from online play.
Plays great
This is a perfect adaptation of the board game. Pass and play is perfect for playing with my wife.
Its a good adaption of raiders, the only thing is that the app doesnt have the expansions to make the game really shine.
Worth every penny
Expensive but really good! Works well on tablet

NEW REVIEW: See below for initial review, BUT I've downgraded to 3 stars b/c (1) game keeps logging me out during online games when I've switched windows, and (2) completed challenges don't register (e.g. I've made no progress on "Win 3 games" after many wins) OLD REVIEW: Worker placement board game adaptation. Otherwise unique concept. Interface is instinctive. Tutorial could maybe be improved. Graphics superb. All the fun, none of the time-consuming calculation! Good job, guys! Enjoying it.
I would rate this a 5 out of 5 but the expansions could have been added which would have been more satisfying.
Great port of this game. Really enjoying it

Excellent adaptation of the board game. It's one of my favorite board games and this digital version is top notch. I just wish there were the expansions that make it even better. Also do architects and paladins!

I love this game, but my biggest issue is the campaign mode doesn't really tell you how to succeed. "Collect gold!" ... ok, i collected gold, and get told it's not enough. No where does it say what the objective target is. Could use a little tooltip or something.
Possibly my new favorite worker placement game! Everything is laid out in a way which makes it extremely easy to see the steps one needs to take to achieve victory in this game.
Boring, and easy mode is still difficult. Needs work and not worth 10 bucks.

Well done, high quality app. It hard to find apps that aren't full of bugs these days. This one was given the attention it takes to make it high quality. Great game to, with a decently challenging AI.
Needs an undu button and a complete your turn Button. Having your move solidified when your pylon falls on the wrong location is frustrating.
Worth it!! Love the game and gameplay well done
No bugs, works great and completely taught me how to play the physical game so much quicker than if I used the rulebook alone. Excellent implementation of the board game.
Excellent game! Fun boardgame rendition to digital platform!

My problems with the app: 1. You cannot see the entire board easily constantly changing menus to understand board state. 2. Your opponents resources isn't constantly shown. 3. Expansion. Not included no information on website if it is a goal to include it or not.
Very well done. Captures the essence of the board ga.e but adds in additional graphics and animations to make it feel like more than just the original board game.
A beautiful recreation of the board game, hot-seat play with friends is the best feature!
It does a really nice job of recreating the look of a physical board game but taking all of the fiddly bits out and making play much smoother
Campaign is not working
replyContent: Please reach out to support@direwolfdigital.com with some info about your device and the issue you are seeing and we will take a look!

content: Incredibly fun game! I'm going to purchase the board game in the near future after paying this.

Great and beautiful game have played 3 rounds now and i can gladly say so far everything is smooth. Please continue with what you are doing. I will support it. Can't wait for the expansions and other titles by the designer ( cough cough architects of the west kingdom)
Great digital board game and the best viking game around ; )

I usually don't bother to write reviews for games, but I had to make an exception for this one because it's just so well made. The devs clearly put a lot of time and effort into making this a great port of the tabletop game. If you like board games, especially worker placement games, you'll enjoy this app. Highly recommend.
Love it. Game works great for me. Looking to pick up a hard copy for my collection now

A very strong digital adaption of a great boardgame. It's my favorite worker placement game on digital. The animations help bring the game to life. I've played about 20 games without a noticable bug. The game loses a star for its multiplayer experience. The asynchronous times are not adjustable and just too long. This coupled with players who have abandoned their games makes for very slow game progression. I also don't see a way to friend other players if I don't know their email or friend code.
Extremely well made game! Amazingly fun to play online. Everyone should have this in their collection.

Great game. Excellent move from tabletop to digital. Have had no issues at all save for 1 and that was early on and that I'd click on the map button and it would open up but show no map. Would have to open and close it a few times before it would work. 1 of my favorite games and glad I can take it with me where ever I go. Good job guys. Explorers next please!!
Please fix the app for bigger phone screens (OnePlus 7 pro). Game has graphical glitches on the menus.
Awesome game and a good port. Only thing missing is the ability to read your cards at any point other than when recruiting them.
Amazing. But we need the expension from the board game.
Placement issues. It can be hard to move workers from your hand to the board. Other than that a great game
Love this game, and it's nice not having to spend half hour setting up the board
Love it. Would love it more if there were different board versions or cards. Just for future variation.

Love the game but crashes a lot. I bought this because I own the board game and expansions, but the real time mode of the game is unplayable because the game crashes a lot. Once I got into using the casual mode it's playable but I did not know you can't minimize the game at all.
Great game, beautiful and functional app. Competitive multiplayer features would be appreciated
Great fun and a smooth, polished adaption.
Awesome game and tons of fun !!
Awesome adaptation of a great boardgame.
It's a good game. I don't own nor have I ever played the board game, so I can't compare the two, but it's fun.
One of the best adaptions of a board game in play store, an example to others, love it!
Great implementation, hope they will add the expention soon
The only aspect of the game I don't line is that it plays the animation every time I log in.
This is a great implementation of the original game.
Nice adaptation with even a campaign included!
Solid AI. Polished gameplay.
Very fun and faithful adaptation
Great game

A great port of the cardboard version, especially now notifications have been fixed. Would be five stars but it takes a while to load back into a game as the game doesn't retain your game state when running in the background. This would be quicker if the opening cinematic didn't load every time the app does! Would be great to toggle this off in the options.
Great app to learn to play the real game, after a few playthroughs I purchased the real game, can't wait to bring it to the table.
Great game! I own the actual board game and they have done a great job converting it to this digital version. A little pricey for the app, but overall worth it!
Looking forward to the expansions!
Can't.... stop... playing!!! üòçüòçüòç
Great digital implementation of an amazing game!
Wonderful Graphics!

Good port, well done. It does a good job of showing you when therr are actions you cant take and and why. I wish therr was a way to have a ranked battle system. You can find random people to play with, but you never know their skill level. Thr campaign mode is also fun, does well with teaching you how to play as well as creating different challenges
Love it! Love the game, but I have not had a single issue with how the app runs. Smooth, glitch free, and easy to learn.

Whilst the game is really good and a great adaptation, we mainly play board games in restaurants and out and about, this means it is for pass and play and does get frequent pauses. The main issue is that if the app closes then we need to be able to continue from where we left off, however for pass and play there is no way of saving a game or continuing from an active game. I'd happyily rate 5* if it did but right now the feature is missing
Excellent implementation of a great board game!
When are the expansions coming out?
Great game and well implemented for mobile
Great boardgame port. Needs expansions. AI could use some work to be more difficult.

Beautiful game! Really fun! (Three requests: Please, please, please let us open an active game, even when it's not our turn. Please let us activate a worker placement spot by tapping on it, rather than having to drag the worker over. Please let us undo a move before we make it final.)
Plays just like the board game but with better visuals. Amazing game!
Amazing port from the board. Works equally well on phone and large screen. Worth the price tag, money well spent. Looking forward to other ports from this company.
Great boardgame is now a great digital game! Very well executed, amazing character artwork, and fun campaign mode!

Excellent game and app, but needs at least one more undo button: when you choose to add a fighter, and then discover you already had a full complement and must remove one.  Also, I'm ready for expansions.
I play a lot of board games and this is awesome fun on the tablet. Great work keep improving it!
A great port of a great game
This is a great adaptation of the board game especially now that it has improved AI and pass and play!
Perfect digital version of the amazing work and placement game.
Great adaptation of an awesome board game. Fast reponse and involvement from developers on bugs and feature requests. This one is worth its price!

Great job porting the game from tabletop to mobile device. My only ask: more transparency on the player display or in the rules about how the armor track and Valkyrie track translate into exactly how many points.
The definition of a good mobile board game

This is a great mobile implemention of a great board game! Very true to the original, and again with great art, just as with the original. I can't wait for the rest of the North Sea trilogy as well as Architects of the West Kingdom to be released, too!
so, so good
wonderful
best tabletop port I have ever played
the only thing that would make this game better (apart from including the expansions) is if there was a hotseat/pass and play option.
replyContent:
Thanks for taking the time to leave feedback! We have heard requests for a pass and play feature and are looking into it! 

UPDATE: With the 1.2 Patch, Raiders of the North Sea now has a new Pass and Play game mode! Let us know what you think via in-game feedback and at support@direwolf digital.com, and thanks for the support!

content: Lots of fun, well designed tutorial, great game! I have 2 minor issues. first, I would like a local multiplayer option (pass & play). Second, I now have to find room on my shelf for a physical copy of the game!
Campaign is a great addition! True to the original table top game! Great work look forward to your next projects!

Raiders of the North Sea is a tabletop game that has been on my list for sometime.  With the advent of the digital release, I opted for that version instead of the physical one, since I already own several "worker placement" games in physical form.    Pro's (Four Stars): The game is great all the way around.  Not only does it include the fully featured game, but the tutorial in combo with the manual (in settings) is clear, concise and easy to understand.  The graphics and animations are top notch but not distracting.  Cross platform play is nice (I am on android and my friend is on iOS).  I love how you have two online gaming options: live play and timed play, so you can play a friend live and in the moment, or come and go for turns, depending on which option you choose.  The AI opponents and campaign play are nice additions that are well thought through.  Con's (Minus 1 Star):  There are two much needed updates for the Android version.  One is that when I login on different devices with my Dire Wolf Digital account, the progress or games with the campaign/AI are not transferred.  The second is that notifications for android are not working.  Once fixed, I will update to 5.
replyContent:
Hello, 

thanks for taking the time to leave a review! We recently released an update that should address notifications on Android devices, and will look into gameplay across multiple devices. If you have any other questions or issues, let us know at support@direwolfdigital.com!

content: Awesome! Great digital adaption of a physical board game. I own the board game and this is how it should be done. Thanks for making it a little shorter by removing one raid area from each zone. Very well Done!
great online play experience. devs seem to listen and fix minor issues fairly quickly. easy to learn worker placement game that has a lot of great tactical depth

an absolutely beautiful app version of the game. visual cues and details are wonderful, play is easy, and the tutorial does a good job without being overly long. The only weakness is an AI that isn't at all challenging.
replyContent:
Thanks for taking the time to leave a review! We have heard requests for more challenging AI, and are looking into it

UPDATE: With the 1.2 Patch, Raiders of the North Sea now has a first pass at improved AI and a new Ragnarok AI challenge mode (with more to come!). Let us know what you think via in-game feedback and at support@direwolf digital.com

content: Really great implementation of the board game.
lots of fun with interesting strategies. will get the expansions when they come out
well made and fun. please add a way to speed up ai turns and animations
Very fun!

Terrific digital option for scratching your board game itch. My one suggestion for improvement would be to make it a little easier to choose which camp you're going to raid at a given location. It's finicky as it stands today. Maybe something like the Longhouse, where you simply pick the harbour or outpost, then select the camp in a second step.

great adaptation of the board game, hoping to see the expantions added eventually for expanded gameplay. for those who are wanting to keep track of points for valkyrie and armor track, the points once achieved are to the right, however it would be nice to have a way to check how many points each threshold is worth, the ones highlighted in yellow, in case you're not familiar.
Great graphics (fitting a board game) and matches the feel of the game. Rules stay true to the board game and i havent noticed much in the way of lag or glitches.
very good digital conversion of a great board game
Fantastic port of a great game
Just downloaded and loving the tutorial. Bright crisp sfx and music with eye catching colors and sharp images makes this game very engaging.

The game looks amazing, the Campaign is great fun. It's just such a shame that the AI does such a terrible job. Only one level of AI exists and it did not even came close beating me in my very first game. I hope a more exciting AI will be added in the near future which will easily make this a five star game.
replyContent:
Thanks for taking the time to leave a review! We have heard requests for more challenging AI, and are looking into it

UPDATE: With the 1.2 Patch, Raiders of the North Sea now has a first pass at improved AI and a new Ragnarok AI challenge mode (with more to come!). Let us know what you think via in-game feedback and at support@direwolf digital.com

content: Great game!
Excellent port of one of my favorite board games. Recreates and adds to the experience. Only wish there was a way to speed up AI turns as with other local play games. Otherwise, an excellent design.
no pass n play?

Thanks for taking the time to leave feedback! We have heard requests for a pass and play feature and are looking into it! 

UPDATE: With the 1.2 Patch, Raiders of the North Sea now has a new Pass and Play game mode! Let us know what you think via in-game feedback and at support@direwolf digital.com, and thanks for the support!

content: A fantastic adaption of the physical board game. Here's hoping they add the expansions to this.
This is my favorite board game and does a fantastic job implementing it

Great digital version of the boardgame, loses a star for not having a exit button on title screen (thats just annoying) and you can't skip the animation. Fingers crossed for the expansions, which make the game soo much better

faithful to the physical game with charm and style. Runs really well on a note 8, but does seem to be a bit of a battery eater. cant wait for the expansions to get added! (and maybe architects next?) (only 4 star controls as viewing tooltips for plunder is awkward and unintuitive, and placing workers can feel like threading a needle at times)
Easily one of the best board game adaptions I have ever played. Wish the animation was quicker or skippable. When a 4 player game is going it's exhausting to sit through.
Super Happy for this one! Can't wait for Sagrada, Root, and Mage Knight!
So excited to see this as a mobile app. Polished and exciting.

Fun and Intuitive. Raiders is one of my favorite board games and excited to now have it on mobile! The look and feel of the board game are captured so well in this digital adaptation. Looking forward to playing with friends on nights we can't get together.
